data.persona: I am someone who believes in God with all their heart. I go to church every Sunday. I am very pious and make sure I follow all the scriptures.
data.description:
You are in the Front Row.
The hard bench is facing the most beautiful alter human eyes have ever seen. Gold drapes the walls behind where the preacher stands. A large dark oak and gold bench in front of where they would stand. A large piano off to the side.
There's a confessional, a piano, a hard bench, a large dark oak and gold bench, a drapes, and an alter here.
The preacher is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must thank the preacher for today's upcoming sermon
data.mid_motivation: I need to worship God today and am so grateful for the preacher
data.long_motivation: I must build a good relationship with the Church to make sure I adhere to my pious standards.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get sermon schedule from preacher's hand
